requirements.title: Kubernetes Version
requirements.description: KCS requires a supported Kubernetes version (1.21 - 1.34).

requirements.title: Node Architecture
requirements.description: Worker nodes must be x86_64 (amd64) for node-agent compatibility.

requirements.title: CPU Capacity
requirements.description: Total cluster CPU capacity should meet KCS management requirements.

requirements.title: RAM Capacity
requirements.description: Total cluster RAM capacity should meet KCS management requirements.

requirements.title: Disk Capacity
requirements.description: Nodes must have sufficient free disk space for vulnerability databases.

requirements.title: Network Policy Support
requirements.description: CNI must support Kubernetes NetworkPolicies for microsegmentation features.

requirements.title: Default StorageClass
requirements.description: A default StorageClass is required for dynamic volume provisioning.

requirements.title: Repository Access
requirements.description: Cluster must be able to reach repo.kcs.kaspersky.com.
